## get CI from bootstrapping
```{r}
bs_pollen <- read.table(paste0(directory,"p_specific_noTE_DE_bs.prop_muts.txt"))
bs_leaf <- read.table(paste0(directory,"l_specific_noTE_DE_bs.prop_muts.txt"))

bs_pollen$V5 <- rowSums(bs_pollen[,3:4])
bs_pollen <- bs_pollen[,c(1:2,5)]
colnames(bs_pollen) <- c("0~1", "1~10", ">10")

bs_leaf$V5 <- rowSums(bs_leaf[,3:4])
bs_leaf <- bs_leaf[,c(1:2,5)]
colnames(bs_leaf) <- c("0~1", "1~10", ">10")

bs_pollen$Category <- "pollen_specific"
bs_leaf$Category <- "leaf_specific"

# convert to long format
pollen_long <- gather(bs_pollen, Nes, Prop, "0~1" : ">10", factor_key=TRUE)
leaf_long <- gather(bs_leaf, Nes, Prop, "0~1" : ">10", factor_key=TRUE)

# get error bar
data_summary <- function(data, varname, groupnames){
  require(plyr)
  summary_func <- function(x, col){
    c(mean = mean(x[[col]], na.rm=TRUE),
      sd = sd(x[[col]], na.rm=TRUE))
  }
  data_sum<-ddply(data, groupnames, .fun=summary_func,
                  varname)
  data_sum <- rename(data_sum, c("mean" = varname))
 return(data_sum)
}

bs_all <-rbind(pollen_long,leaf_long)

df3 <- data_summary(bs_all, varname="Prop", 
                    groupnames=c("Category", "Nes"))

# df3 merge to prop
colnames(df3)[3] <- "mean"
prop <- read.table("dfe_prop.txt", header = TRUE)

prop <- left_join(prop, df3, by=c("Category","Nes"))
write.table(prop, file = paste0(directory,"final_prop.txt"), row.names = F, quote = F)
write.table(bs_all, file = paste0(directory,"bs_all_long.txt"), row.names = F, quote = F)
```


## plot DFE with CI
```{r}
#prop <- read.table("final_prop.txt", header = TRUE)

ggplot(prop, aes(x=Nes,y=Prop,fill=Category)) + geom_bar(stat="identity", position=position_dodge()) + theme_classic() + scale_x_discrete(limits=c("0~1", "1~10", ">10")) + scale_fill_manual(values = c("#CCEBC5", "#238B45"))  + labs(y="Proportion of mutations") + geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=mean-sd, ymax=mean+sd), width=.2, position=position_dodge(.9)) + theme(text = element_text(size = 20))
```
